                            # 03ã€Async ç¤ºä¾‹

                            é™¤äº† Consoleï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ Asyncï¼Œå¯ä»¥é…åˆæ–‡ä»¶çš„æ–¹å¼æ¥å¼‚æ­¥å†™å…¥ï¼Œå…¸å‹çš„é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

                            <Configuration>
  <Appenders>
    <File name="DebugFile" fileName="debug.log">
      <PatternLayout>
        <Pattern>%d %p %c [%t] %m%n</Pattern>
      </PatternLayout>
    </File>
    <Async name="Async">
      <AppenderRef ref="DebugFile"/>
    </Async>
  </Appenders>
  <Loggers>
    <Root level="debug">
      <AppenderRef ref="Async"/>
    </Root>
  </Loggers>
</Configuration>

                            å¯¹æ¯” Logback çš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ¥çœ‹ï¼ŒLog4j 2 çœŸçš„å¤æ‚äº†ä¸€äº›ï¼Œä¸å¤ªå¥½ç”¨ï¼Œå°±è¿™ä¹ˆç›´ç™½åœ°è¯´å§ï¼ä½†è‡ªå·±çº¦çš„ï¼Œå«ç€æ³ªä¹Ÿå¾—æ‰“å®Œå•Šã€‚æŠŠè¿™ä¸ª Async åŠ å…¥åˆ° Appendersï¼š

                            <Configuration>
    <Appenders>
        <Console name="Console" target="SYSTEM_OUT">
            <PatternLayout pattern="%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%t] %-5level %logger{36} - %msg%n"/>
        </Console>
        <File name="DebugFile" fileName="debug.log">
            <PatternLayout>
                <Pattern>%d %p %c [%t] %m%n</Pattern>
            </PatternLayout>
        </File>
        <Async name="Async">
            <AppenderRef ref="DebugFile"/>
        </Async>
    </Appenders>
    <Loggers>
        <Root level="DEBUG">
            <AppenderRef ref="Console"/>
            <AppenderRef ref="Async"/>
        </Root>
    </Loggers>
</Configuration>

                            # 04ã€RollingFile ç¤ºä¾‹

                            å½“ç„¶äº†ï¼ŒLog4j å’Œ Logback æˆ‘ä»¬éƒ½é…ç½®äº† RollingFileï¼ŒLog4j 2 ä¹Ÿå°‘ä¸äº†ã€‚RollingFile ä¼šæ ¹æ® Triggeringï¼ˆè§¦å‘ï¼‰ç­–ç•¥å’Œ Rolloverï¼ˆè¿‡æ¸¡ï¼‰ç­–ç•¥æ¥è¿›è¡Œæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶æ»šåŠ¨ã€‚å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰é…ç½® Rolloverï¼Œåˆ™ä½¿ç”¨ DefaultRolloverStrategy æ¥ä½œä¸º RollingFile çš„é»˜è®¤é…ç½®ã€‚

                            è§¦å‘ç­–ç•¥åŒ…å«æœ‰ï¼ŒåŸºäº cron è¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼ˆæºäºå¸Œè…Šè¯­ï¼Œæ—¶é—´çš„æ„æ€ï¼Œç”¨æ¥é…ç½®å®šæœŸæ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡çš„æ—¶é—´æ ¼å¼ï¼‰çš„ CronTriggeringPolicyï¼›åŸºäºæ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°çš„ SizeBasedTriggeringPolicyï¼›åŸºäºæ—¶é—´çš„ TimeBasedTriggeringPolicyã€‚

                            è¿‡æ¸¡ç­–ç•¥åŒ…å«æœ‰ï¼Œé»˜è®¤çš„è¿‡æ¸¡ç­–ç•¥ DefaultRolloverStrategyï¼Œç›´æ¥å†™å…¥çš„ DirectWriteRolloverStrategyã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨é»˜è®¤çš„è¿‡æ¸¡ç­–ç•¥å³å¯ï¼Œå®ƒå·²ç»è¶³å¤Ÿå¼ºå¤§ã€‚

                            æ¥çœ‹ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy å’Œ TimeBasedTriggeringPolicy ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œä»¥åŠç¼ºçœ DefaultRolloverStrategy ç­–ç•¥çš„é…ç½®ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

                            <Configuration>
  <Appenders>
    <RollingFile name="RollingFile" fileName="rolling.log"
                 filePattern="rolling-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}-%i.log">
      <PatternLayout>
        <Pattern>%d %p %c{1.} [%t] %m%n</Pattern>
      </PatternLayout>
      <Policies>
        <SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy size="1 KB"/>
      </Policies>
    </RollingFile>
  </Appenders>
  <Loggers>
    <Root level="debug">
      <AppenderRef ref="RollingFile"/>
    </Root>
  </Loggers>
</Configuration>

                            <RollingFile name="RollingFileGZ" fileName="gz/rolling.log"
             filePattern="gz/%d{yyyy-MM-dd-HH}-%i.rolling.gz">
    <PatternLayout>
        <Pattern>%d %p %c{1.} [%t] %m%n</Pattern>
    </PatternLayout>
    <Policies>
        <SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy size="1 KB"/>
    </Policies>
</RollingFile>
